channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meet the Chanel chief who hires for personality over talent or skills—and the 3 red flag traits she rejects
item.description: Exclusive: As Gen Z fights to stand out in one of the most competitive job markets in decades, Chanel says it’s looking for personality hires.

item.title: Christmas Is Back in Bethlehem, but Peace and Joy Have Yet to Arrive
item.description: Palestinian Christians are reviving their seasonal public celebrations, hoping to bring light and holiday spirit at the end of a gloomy year in the We...

item.title: Former U.S. Secret Service agent says bringing your authentic self to work stifles teamwork: ‘You don’t get high performers, you get sloppiness’
item.description: “Could you imagine if I brought my authentic New York self to every interrogation I did?” asked former Secret Service agent Evy Poumpouras.

item.title: Trump administration puts offshore wind projects on hold, citing mysterious Pentagon national security warning
item.description: Trump has been hostile to renewable energy, particularly offshore wind, and prioritizes fossil fuels to produce electricity.

item.title: A Conspicuous Gap May Undermine Trump’s Birthright Citizenship Plan
item.description: A historical review shows lawmakers without certain familial records went unchallenged as citizens when the 14th Amendment was adopted. The finding ap...

item.title: Larry Ellison Personally Guarantees Paramount Bid for Warner Brothers
item.description: Mr. Ellison’s personal guarantee is meant to address concerns that the Warner Bros. Discovery’s board had expressed about Paramount’s original offer.

item.title: Billionaire Larry Ellison comes to his son’s rescue, agreeing to personally guarantee over $40 billion to finance Paramount’s bid for Warner Bros.
item.description: Warner Bros. is in the middle of a tug-of-war between Netflix and David Ellison's company, Paramount Skydance.

item.title: At Turning Point Fest, Vance Refuses to Take Sides in Fight Over Bigotry
item.description: The vice president’s plea for a big-tent coalition at an annual conservative gathering belied the cracks in his party over antisemitism, racism and co...

item.title: Mark Cuban says AI allows ‘creators to become exponentially more creative,’ but his advice didn’t land well with people working in the industry
item.description: “All you can see is dollar signs and ‘value’ instead of theft, exploitation, and job displacement,” one creative said in response.

item.title: In Congress and at Home, Omar Faces Trump’s Anti-Somali Attacks
item.description: Representative Ilhan Omar, Democrat of Minnesota, has long been a target of racist insults by the president. Now her whole community faces an immigrat...

item.title: Puzzle Designers Search for That ‘Satisfying Click’
item.description: For prizewinning puzzle creators, the devilish ideas are in the details.
